job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Do you want to work for an Emmy® Award-winning company? At Audible Magic we are building the most revolutionary media recognition technology and rights management solutions for the global music, movie and television industry. Our customers and partners include some of the largest and most recognized brands in the industry. We win awards because we keep driving to provide better solutions for our customers, solutions that meet the needs of the ever-changing music and entertainment industry. At Audible Magic we believe our customers are paramount, and our reputation and integrity are the foundation of our business.
Responsibilities
Manage entire sections of our platform by taking projects from idea to implementation
Collaborate closely with our design teams on implementing new features and workflows
Build highly reliable and scalable cloud-based applications
Clearly communicate status and open issues to team leads and managers
Ability to learn on the job and implement new technologies
Advocate and evangelist of the micro services architecture and REST API vision
Develop and maintain the external developer portal containing reference implementations, swagger-based testing interfaces and articles
Drive the containerizing effort of the API artifacts
Requirements
Superior communication chops, both verbal and written, including excellent technical writing and interpersonal skills
3+ years of relevant software engineering experience.
AGILE or iterative development experience
Ability to write unit tests (TDD practices) for back-end and front-end services
Work effectively under stress, independently, and within a team
A devil for the details, able to work well under deadlines in a changing environment and perform multiple tasks effectively and concurrently
Preferred Experience
3+ years of Object-Oriented Programming (.NET or java)
2+ years of Database experience (SQL and NoSQL databases)
1+ years of NodeJS experience
Basic experience building RESTful web services
Basic experience working with Message Queue Systems
Basic experience working with XML and JSON formats
Added Bonus
Experience with AWS or similar cloud computing environments
Experience building and managing automated build/test/deployment
Experience working with Docker
Experience working with Oracle Databases
Microservice architectures knowledge
Robust knowledge of API software design patterns
Education
Must have a bachelor’s degree (masters’ preferred) in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Engineering, or any other technology related field. An equivalent of this educational requirement in working experience is also acceptable.
